synopsis.text: The second installment in the "Cyborg 009" series finds our heroes facing off against the nefarious Black Ghost organization, which has launched a global assault using colossal robots in the form of prehistoric creatures. In response, a formidable team of nine cyborgs embarks on a mission to locate the Black Ghost's secret lair. Along the way, they encounter a myriad of monstrous adversaries, including enormous jellyfish, stingrays, and plesiosaurs, as well as traitorous cyborgs. Amidst their perilous journey, the team crosses paths with a young woman named Helena, adding a new layer to their adventure. Will they be able to overcome these challenges and save the world from the clutches of the Black Ghost? Join Cyborg 009 and his team in this action-packed anime to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
